availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, carpenter. Kentucky native. Son of John Henry and Elizabeth Henry. Resident of Harrison County, Kentucky, in 1850. Carpenter in Harrison County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 2, p. 121A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 2, p. 465.
"Newton Jasper Henry (1835-1910)," Find A Grave, Memorial 43076761, accessed September 21, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/43076761.
